issue.title: Support MSYS2 environment testing in CI
issue.body:
[Windows-MSYS2](https://www.msys2.org/) is a Unix-like environment, I tried to compile `LFortran` in it, and successfully compiled `LFortran`, but unfortunately some unit tests failed.

The packages I have installed are:
```sh
>> pacman -S msys/bison
>> pacman -S msys/re2c
>> pacman -S msys/make
>> pacman -S ucrt64/mingw-w64-ucrt-x86_64-gcc
>> pacman -S ucrt64/mingw-w64-ucrt-x86_64-llvm
>> pacman -S ucrt64/mingw-w64-ucrt-x86_64-binutils
>> pacman -S ucrt64/mingw-w64-ucrt-x86_64-python
>> pacman -S ucrt64/mingw-w64-ucrt-x86_64-python-toml
>> pacman -S ucrt64/mingw-w64-ucrt-x86_64-cmake
>> pip install xonsh
```
I compile `LFortran` using the following command:
```sh
>> cd lfortran
>> cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DWITH_LLVM=yes -DLFORTRAN_BUILD_ALL=yes -DWITH_STACKTRACE=no -DCMAKE_PREFIX_PATH="" -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=lfortran/inst -G "MSYS Makefiles" -B build
>> cd build && make -j4
```

- [GitHub Action: Setup MSYS2](https://github.com/marketplace/actions/setup-msys2)
- https://github.com/lfortran/lfortran/issues/252
- https://github.com/lfortran/lfortran/issues/572

body:
> Cannot find source file:
> 
> ```
> parser/tokenizer.cpp
> ```

Sir, it seems that this error is caused by not having `re2c` installed.
Install `re2c` command in MSYS2:
````sh
pacman -S msys/re2c
pacman -S msys/bison
...
````

> Sir, it seems that this error is caused by not having `re2c` installed. Install `re2c` command in MSYS2:
> 
> ```shell
> pacman -S msys/re2c
> pacman -S msys/bison
> ...
> ```

Spot on, would be nice if you ask cmake to verify that all deps are there (see: #69).
